channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2023110397
item.description:
Report X-2023110397

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-05T18:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-08
  • City: JACKSON
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO DOOR TEN IN UNLOAD ONE TO RESPOND TO LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER RESPONDED IN FULL PPE AND PROCESSED IN DMP.

item.title: Report X-2023110819
item.description:
Report X-2023110819

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-07
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN THE UNLOADING AREA. THE PACKAGE WAS COMPLETELY DESTROYED FROM THE LEAKAGE. DescribePack: THE PACKAGE WAS OPEN AND ONE OF THE CONTAINERS WAS MISSING A TOP. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY HANDLED USING THE CORRECT HAZARDOUS MATERIALS.

item.title: Report X-2023110815

Report X-2023110815

  • State: MS

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN THE UNLOADING AREA LEAKING FROM THE BOTTOM. DescribePack: THE PACKAGE CAP WASN'T TIGHT INSIDE OF THE PACKAGE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY HANDLED USING THE CORRECT HAZAROUS MATERIALS NEEDED AT THE TIME.

item.title: Report X-2023110588
